title: Our Companionship - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Mature   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Yaoi
tags: Childhood Friends   Gangs   Love Interest Falls in Love First
author: Ken
description:
The man who stood before me was massive. Admittedly, the lighting inside the bar was not very bright, but the shadow that hung over his face was unusually dark, and his appearance was not completely visible. However, it was obvious that his face was unforgettable from his sharp eyes and straight mouth.

The man asked in a high-handed manner, as if he were looking down on me.

'Idealize?'
'What...? Uh... Mirae hyung?'

I replied with an awkward smile. I had no choice but to acknowledge him.
Who else would call me by my in-game name at a store in the middle of Gangnam?>
